content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":252652,"originalJapaneseLine":"地図で説明するとここです","translatedEnglishLine":"On the map, it's this place."},{"lineNumber":252653,"originalJapaneseLine":"ここから近いです。","translatedEnglishLine":"It's close from here."},{"lineNumber":252654,"originalJapaneseLine":"よし、すぐに向かうぞ","translatedEnglishLine":"Alright, let's head there immediately."},{"lineNumber":252655,"originalJapaneseLine":"はい、マジックが率いる主力軍も今向かっているはずです。","translatedEnglishLine":"Yes, the main army led by Magic should be heading there now as well."},{"lineNumber":252656,"originalJapaneseLine":"私はマジック達と合流します、後でまたと千鶴子は戻っていく","translatedEnglishLine":"I will join Magic and the others; Chizuruko will go back later."},{"lineNumber":252657,"originalJapaneseLine":"背景　戦場を見下ろす丘","translatedEnglishLine":"Background: Hill overlooking the battlefield."},{"lineNumber":252658,"originalJapaneseLine":"目的の近くに来たが、なんだ騒がしいぞ。","translatedEnglishLine":"We've gotten near the destination, but what's this noise?"},{"lineNumber":252659,"originalJapaneseLine":"少し丘を登ってみると、数万の魔物と数万ほどのハニーが","translatedEnglishLine":"Climbing a little up the hill, tens of thousands of monsters and about the same number of Hannies"},{"lineNumber":252660,"originalJapaneseLine":"大激戦をしていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"were fiercely battling."},{"lineNumber":252661,"originalJapaneseLine":"なんだ・・これは仲間割れか・・","translatedEnglishLine":"What... is this infighting?"},{"lineNumber":252662,"originalJapaneseLine":"俺達、人類軍はどこにもないな、マジック達が来るといっていたが遅れているのか","translatedEnglishLine":"Our human army isn't anywhere to be seen. Magic said they'd come, but are they delayed?"},{"lineNumber":252663,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔物とハニーの戦いだ、奴ら手を組んだのでは無いのか・・","translatedEnglishLine":"It's a fight between monsters and Hannies. Weren't they supposed to be working together?"},{"lineNumber":252664,"originalJapaneseLine":"あいやー、あいやー、こいつら倒せー","translatedEnglishLine":"Aiyaah, aiyaah, defeat these guys!"},{"lineNumber":252665,"originalJapaneseLine":"どういう事だ、これは・・","translatedEnglishLine":"What is going on here...?"},{"lineNumber":252666,"originalJapaneseLine":"わかりません、ですが、チャンスです。","translatedEnglishLine":"I don't know, but this is a chance."},{"lineNumber":252667,"originalJapaneseLine":"この混乱に乗じてウルザさんの居る所へ、魔物大将軍を倒しに向かいましょう","translatedEnglishLine":"Let's take advantage of this confusion and head to where Urza is to defeat the monster general."},{"lineNumber":252668,"originalJapaneseLine":"少し前","translatedEnglishLine":"A little earlier."},{"lineNumber":252669,"originalJapaneseLine":"ハニーキングの陣、側には魔物軍から派遣された魔物隊長が居る","translatedEnglishLine":"At the Hanny King's camp, a monster captain dispatched from the monster army stands nearby."},{"lineNumber":252670,"originalJapaneseLine":"ウルザの手紙を受け取っていたハニーが","translatedEnglishLine":"A Hanny who had received a letter from Urza"},{"lineNumber":252671,"originalJapaneseLine":"ウルザからの信号を受けてハニーキングに手紙を渡す","translatedEnglishLine":"Received a signal from Urza and handed the letter to the Hanny King."},{"lineNumber":252672,"originalJapaneseLine":"その手紙には、メディウサによる悲惨な女の子の殺戮写真が入って居た","translatedEnglishLine":"The letter contained gruesome photos of girls slaughtered by Medusa."},{"lineNumber":252673,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔軍は捕まえた人間をこんな風に処分しますよと","translatedEnglishLine":"It said the demon army disposes of captured humans in this way."},{"lineNumber":252674,"originalJapaneseLine":"怒るハニーキング、","translatedEnglishLine":"The Hanny King, enraged,"},{"lineNumber":252675,"originalJapaneseLine":"側の魔物隊長に言う、君・・これはどういう事だね。","translatedEnglishLine":"says to the monster captain beside him, 'You... what is the meaning of this?'"},{"lineNumber":252676,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔物大将軍ツォトン君は、我々と一緒に人間をいじめて可愛がろうという話だったが","translatedEnglishLine":"Monster General Tsoton was supposed to be playing nice and bullying humans together with us,"},{"lineNumber":252677,"originalJapaneseLine":"これは、殺戮ではないか、というか女の子にこんな事をしてはいかーーん","translatedEnglishLine":"but this is slaughter, and doing such things to girls is unacceptable!"},{"lineNumber":252678,"originalJapaneseLine":"わかった、お前達は俺達の敵だ。","translatedEnglishLine":"I see. You all are our enemies."},{"lineNumber":252679,"originalJapaneseLine":"いや、しかし、ハニー達も人間と敵対しているのでは・・","translatedEnglishLine":"No, but aren't the Hannies also hostile toward humans...?"},{"lineNumber":252680,"originalJapaneseLine":"ばかやろう、俺達は人間と仲良く喧嘩したいのだー","translatedEnglishLine":"You idiot! We want to have a friendly fight with humans!"},{"lineNumber":252681,"originalJapaneseLine":"乱戦の最中、ハニー達の部隊と遭遇","translatedEnglishLine":"During the chaotic battle, we encountered a Hanny unit."},{"lineNumber":252682,"originalJapaneseLine":"ハニーの隊長は、ランス達を見て部下を止める","translatedEnglishLine":"The Hanny captain sees Lance and the others and stops his subordinates."},{"lineNumber":252683,"originalJapaneseLine":"「まて、今は人間達と遊んでいる時では無い、ハニーキング様は魔物を","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Wait, now is not the time to play with humans. The Hanny King has ordered to"},{"lineNumber":252684,"originalJapaneseLine":"　本気で殲滅せよと命じられたのだ」","translatedEnglishLine":"seriously annihilate the monsters.\""},{"lineNumber":252685,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あいやー、はにほー、はにほー」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Aiyaah, haniho, haniho.\" [Hannies' chant]"},{"lineNumber":252686,"originalJapaneseLine":"ハニー達は、ランス達を無視して戦場に海に消えていった","translatedEnglishLine":"The Hannies ignored Lance and the others and disappeared into the battlefield and sea."},{"lineNumber":252687,"originalJapaneseLine":"よくわからんが、ウルザが言っていたハニー達はなんとかするというのは","translatedEnglishLine":"I don't really understand, but maybe what Urza said about the Hannies 'taking care of things'"},{"lineNumber":252688,"originalJapaneseLine":"こういう事だったのかもしれないな。と誰か、ランスでもいいし","translatedEnglishLine":"is something like this. Someone — Lance or anyone — said so."},{"lineNumber":252689,"originalJapaneseLine":"とにかく魔軍はハニーとの相手で混乱している、いまのうちに敵ボス","translatedEnglishLine":"Anyway, the demon army is in chaos dealing with the Hannies, so now is the time to attack the enemy boss."},{"lineNumber":252690,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔物大将軍ツォトンを倒すぞ","translatedEnglishLine":"Let's defeat Monster General Tsoton."},{"lineNumber":252691,"originalJapaneseLine":"ハニーの部隊と遭遇した時、ランス達とは特に関係なくていいです","translatedEnglishLine":"When encountering the Hanny unit, no special relation to Lance and the others is necessary."},{"lineNumber":252692,"originalJapaneseLine":"ハニー同士の２．３クリックの会話","translatedEnglishLine":"A 2-3 click conversation between Hannies."},{"lineNumber":252693,"originalJapaneseLine":"戦場で魔軍と戦っている所だが、遊んでいる感じ","translatedEnglishLine":"They're fighting the demon army on the battlefield, but it feels like they're playing."},{"lineNumber":252694,"originalJapaneseLine":"ハニーの部隊と遭遇した時、ランス達とは特に関係なくていいです","translatedEnglishLine":"When encountering the Hanny unit, no special relation to Lance and the others is necessary."},{"lineNumber":252695,"originalJapaneseLine":"ハニー同士の２．３クリックの会話","translatedEnglishLine":"A 2-3 click conversation between Hannies."},{"lineNumber":252696,"originalJapaneseLine":"戦場で魔軍と戦っている所だが、遊んでいる感じ","translatedEnglishLine":"They're fighting the demon army on the battlefield, but it feels like they're playing."},{"lineNumber":252697,"originalJapaneseLine":"少し遅れてマジックが率いるゼス本国軍６千が戦場に到着した","translatedEnglishLine":"Shortly after, 6,000 troops of the Zeth homeland army led by Magic arrived at the battlefield."},{"lineNumber":252698,"originalJapaneseLine":"どういう事、ハニーが魔物と仲間割れ・・・","translatedEnglishLine":"What's going on? The Hannies are having infighting with the monsters..."},{"lineNumber":252699,"originalJapaneseLine":"誰かが補足、ウルザさんがハニーの事はなんとかすると言っていました","translatedEnglishLine":"Someone added that Urza said they'd handle the Hannies somehow."},{"lineNumber":252700,"originalJapaneseLine":"この事では・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Could it be about this matter..."},{"lineNumber":252701,"originalJapaneseLine":"そこにハニーが現れた。ゼス軍だね。アクシュ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Then the Hannies appeared. The Zeth army, right? Akushu."},{"lineNumber":252702,"originalJapaneseLine":"ボク達は魔物は許せない、一緒に戦おう。","translatedEnglishLine":"We cannot forgive the monsters. Let's fight together."},{"lineNumber":252703,"originalJapaneseLine":"あっ、ゼスの人達でボク達に魔法が効かないからと毛嫌いしていたみたいだけど","translatedEnglishLine":"Ah, the Zeth folks seemed to detest us because magic doesn't work on us,"},{"lineNumber":252704,"originalJapaneseLine":"意外と可愛い人が多いね、僕すきになっちゃった","translatedEnglishLine":"but there are actually many cute people. I kind of like them now."},{"lineNumber":252705,"originalJapaneseLine":"マジックのまわりをうろうろするハニー、みてみて、この人　委員長だよ、委員長","translatedEnglishLine":"Hannies wandering around Magic—look, this person is the chairman, the chairman."},{"lineNumber":252706,"originalJapaneseLine":"ちょっと何かいってみて委員長","translatedEnglishLine":"Say something, please, Chairman."},{"lineNumber":252707,"originalJapaneseLine":"ふざけないで戦争中なのよ、貴方たちの仲間も今戦っているのでしょ、早く戦場に","translatedEnglishLine":"Don't joke around; we are in the middle of a war. Your comrades are fighting now too, so get to the battlefield quickly."},{"lineNumber":252708,"originalJapaneseLine":"うわっ・・おこった、叱られた、やっぱ委員長だーと喜ぶ","translatedEnglishLine":"Wow... she's mad, scolded us! As expected of the chairman! [They rejoice]"},{"lineNumber":252709,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔軍の陣地","translatedEnglishLine":"Demon army's camp."},{"lineNumber":252710,"originalJapaneseLine":"ツォトンがいる、ハニー達め裏切りやがって","translatedEnglishLine":"Tsoton is here. Those Hannies betrayed us."},{"lineNumber":252711,"originalJapaneseLine":"所詮、陶器の畜生か、扱いやすい連中だから利用してやったのに","translatedEnglishLine":"They're just fragile beasts after all; they were easy to manipulate, so I used them."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 地図で説明するとここです
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: On the map, it's this place.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ここから近いです。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's close from here.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よし、すぐに向かうぞ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alright, let's head there immediately.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: はい、マジックが率いる主力軍も今向かっているはずです。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yes, the main army led by Magic should be heading there now as well.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私はマジック達と合流します、後でまたと千鶴子は戻っていく
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I will join Magic and the others; Chizuruko will go back later.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 背景　戦場を見下ろす丘
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Background: Hill overlooking the battlefield.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 目的の近くに来たが、なんだ騒がしいぞ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We've gotten near the destination, but what's this noise?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 少し丘を登ってみると、数万の魔物と数万ほどのハニーが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Climbing a little up the hill, tens of thousands of monsters and about the same number of Hannies

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大激戦をしていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: were fiercely battling.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんだ・・これは仲間割れか・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What... is this infighting?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺達、人類軍はどこにもないな、マジック達が来るといっていたが遅れているのか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Our human army isn't anywhere to be seen. Magic said they'd come, but are they delayed?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物とハニーの戦いだ、奴ら手を組んだのでは無いのか・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's a fight between monsters and Hannies. Weren't they supposed to be working together?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あいやー、あいやー、こいつら倒せー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Aiyaah, aiyaah, defeat these guys!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どういう事だ、これは・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What is going on here...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: わかりません、ですが、チャンスです。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I don't know, but this is a chance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この混乱に乗じてウルザさんの居る所へ、魔物大将軍を倒しに向かいましょう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Let's take advantage of this confusion and head to where Urza is to defeat the monster general.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 少し前
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A little earlier.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ハニーキングの陣、側には魔物軍から派遣された魔物隊長が居る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At the Hanny King's camp, a monster captain dispatched from the monster army stands nearby.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ウルザの手紙を受け取っていたハニーが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A Hanny who had received a letter from Urza

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ウルザからの信号を受けてハニーキングに手紙を渡す
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Received a signal from Urza and handed the letter to the Hanny King.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その手紙には、メディウサによる悲惨な女の子の殺戮写真が入って居た
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The letter contained gruesome photos of girls slaughtered by Medusa.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍は捕まえた人間をこんな風に処分しますよと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It said the demon army disposes of captured humans in this way.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 怒るハニーキング、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Hanny King, enraged,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 側の魔物隊長に言う、君・・これはどういう事だね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: says to the monster captain beside him, 'You... what is the meaning of this?'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物大将軍ツォトン君は、我々と一緒に人間をいじめて可愛がろうという話だったが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Monster General Tsoton was supposed to be playing nice and bullying humans together with us,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これは、殺戮ではないか、というか女の子にこんな事をしてはいかーーん
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but this is slaughter, and doing such things to girls is unacceptable!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: わかった、お前達は俺達の敵だ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I see. You all are our enemies.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いや、しかし、ハニー達も人間と敵対しているのでは・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No, but aren't the Hannies also hostile toward humans...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ばかやろう、俺達は人間と仲良く喧嘩したいのだー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You idiot! We want to have a friendly fight with humans!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 乱戦の最中、ハニー達の部隊と遭遇
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: During the chaotic battle, we encountered a Hanny unit.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ハニーの隊長は、ランス達を見て部下を止める
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Hanny captain sees Lance and the others and stops his subordinates.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まて、今は人間達と遊んでいる時では無い、ハニーキング様は魔物を
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Wait, now is not the time to play with humans. The Hanny King has ordered to

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 本気で殲滅せよと命じられたのだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: seriously annihilate the monsters."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あいやー、はにほー、はにほー」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Aiyaah, haniho, haniho." [Hannies' chant]

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ハニー達は、ランス達を無視して戦場に海に消えていった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Hannies ignored Lance and the others and disappeared into the battlefield and sea.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よくわからんが、ウルザが言っていたハニー達はなんとかするというのは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I don't really understand, but maybe what Urza said about the Hannies 'taking care of things'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こういう事だったのかもしれないな。と誰か、ランスでもいいし
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: is something like this. Someone — Lance or anyone — said so.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: とにかく魔軍はハニーとの相手で混乱している、いまのうちに敵ボス
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Anyway, the demon army is in chaos dealing with the Hannies, so now is the time to attack the enemy boss.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物大将軍ツォトンを倒すぞ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Let's defeat Monster General Tsoton.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ハニーの部隊と遭遇した時、ランス達とは特に関係なくていいです
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When encountering the Hanny unit, no special relation to Lance and the others is necessary.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ハニー同士の２．３クリックの会話
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A 2-3 click conversation between Hannies.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦場で魔軍と戦っている所だが、遊んでいる感じ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They're fighting the demon army on the battlefield, but it feels like they're playing.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ハニーの部隊と遭遇した時、ランス達とは特に関係なくていいです
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When encountering the Hanny unit, no special relation to Lance and the others is necessary.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ハニー同士の２．３クリックの会話
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A 2-3 click conversation between Hannies.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦場で魔軍と戦っている所だが、遊んでいる感じ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They're fighting the demon army on the battlefield, but it feels like they're playing.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 少し遅れてマジックが率いるゼス本国軍６千が戦場に到着した
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Shortly after, 6,000 troops of the Zeth homeland army led by Magic arrived at the battlefield.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どういう事、ハニーが魔物と仲間割れ・・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What's going on? The Hannies are having infighting with the monsters...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 誰かが補足、ウルザさんがハニーの事はなんとかすると言っていました
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Someone added that Urza said they'd handle the Hannies somehow.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この事では・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Could it be about this matter...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そこにハニーが現れた。ゼス軍だね。アクシュ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then the Hannies appeared. The Zeth army, right? Akushu.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ボク達は魔物は許せない、一緒に戦おう。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We cannot forgive the monsters. Let's fight together.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あっ、ゼスの人達でボク達に魔法が効かないからと毛嫌いしていたみたいだけど
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah, the Zeth folks seemed to detest us because magic doesn't work on us,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 意外と可愛い人が多いね、僕すきになっちゃった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but there are actually many cute people. I kind of like them now.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マジックのまわりをうろうろするハニー、みてみて、この人　委員長だよ、委員長
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hannies wandering around Magic—look, this person is the chairman, the chairman.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ちょっと何かいってみて委員長
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Say something, please, Chairman.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ふざけないで戦争中なのよ、貴方たちの仲間も今戦っているのでしょ、早く戦場に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Don't joke around; we are in the middle of a war. Your comrades are fighting now too, so get to the battlefield quickly.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: うわっ・・おこった、叱られた、やっぱ委員長だーと喜ぶ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Wow... she's mad, scolded us! As expected of the chairman! [They rejoice]

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍の陣地
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Demon army's camp.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ツォトンがいる、ハニー達め裏切りやがって
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Tsoton is here. Those Hannies betrayed us.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 所詮、陶器の畜生か、扱いやすい連中だから利用してやったのに
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They're just fragile beasts after all; they were easy to manipulate, so I used them.

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

this?'"},{"lineNumber":252676,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔物大将軍ツォトン君は、我々と一緒に人間をいじめて可愛がろうという話だったが","translatedEnglishLine":"Monster General Tsoton was supposed to be playing nice and bullying humans together with us,"},{"lineNumber":252677,"originalJapaneseLine":"これは、殺戮ではないか、というか女の子にこんな事をしてはいかーーん","translatedEnglishLine":"but this is slaughter, and doing such things to girls is We want to have a friendly fight with humans!"},{"lineNumber":252681,"originalJapaneseLine":"乱戦の最中、ハニー達の部隊と遭遇","translatedEnglishLine":"During the chaotic battle, we encountered a Hanny unit."},{"lineNumber":252682,"originalJapaneseLine":"ハニーの隊長は、ランス達を見て部下を止める","translatedEnglishLine":"The Hanny captain sees Lance and the others and stops his subordinates."},{"lineNumber":252683,"originalJapaneseLine":"「まて、今は人間達と遊んでいる時では無い、ハニーキング様は魔物を","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Wait, now is not the time to play with humans. The Hanny King has ordered to"},{"lineNumber":252684,"originalJapaneseLine":"　本気で殲滅せよと命じられたのだ」","translatedEnglishLine":"seriously annihilate the monsters.\""},{"lineNumber":252685,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あいやー、はにほー、はにほー」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Aiyaah, haniho, haniho.\" [Hannies' chant]"},{"lineNumber":252686,"originalJapaneseLine":"ハニー達は、ランス達を無視して戦場に海に消えていった","translatedEnglishLine":"The Hannies ignored Lance and the others and disappeared into the battlefield and sea."},{"lineNumber":252687,"originalJapaneseLine":"よくわからんが、ウルザが言っていたハニー達はなんとかするというのは","translatedEnglishLine":"I don't really understand, but maybe what Urza said about the Hannies 'taking care of things'"},{"lineNumber":252688,"originalJapaneseLine":"こういう事だったのかもしれないな。と誰か、ランスでもいいし","translatedEnglishLine":"is something like this. Someone — Lance or anyone — said so."},{"lineNumber":252689,"originalJapaneseLine":"とにかく魔軍はハニーとの相手で混乱している、いまのうちに敵ボス","translatedEnglishLine":"Anyway, the demon army is in chaos dealing with the Hannies, so now is the time to attack the enemy boss."},{"lineNumber":252690,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔物大将軍ツォトンを倒すぞ","translatedEnglishLine":"Let's defeat Monster General Tsoton."},{"lineNumber":252691,"originalJapaneseLine":"ハニーの部隊と遭遇した時、ランス達とは特に関係なくていいです","translatedEnglishLine":"When encountering the Hanny unit, no special relation to Lance and the others is necessary."},{"lineNumber":252692,"originalJapaneseLine":"ハニー同士の２．３クリックの会話","translatedEnglishLine":"A 2-3 click conversation between Hannies."},{"lineNumber":252693,"originalJapaneseLine":"戦場で魔軍と戦っている所だが、遊んでいる感じ","translatedEnglishLine":"They're fighting the demon army on the battlefield, but it feels like they're playing."},{"lineNumber":252694,"originalJapaneseLine":"ハニーの部隊と遭遇した時、ランス達とは特に関係なくていいです","translatedEnglishLine":"When encountering the Hanny unit, no special relation to Lance and the others is necessary."},{"lineNumber":252695,"originalJapaneseLine":"ハニー同士の２．３クリックの会話","translatedEnglishLine":"A 2-3 click conversation between Hannies."},{"lineNumber":252696,"originalJapaneseLine":"戦場で魔軍と戦っている所だが、遊んでいる感じ","translatedEnglishLine":"They're fighting the demon army on the battlefield, but it feels like they're playing."},{"lineNumber":252697,"originalJapaneseLine":"少し遅れてマジックが率いるゼス本国軍６千が戦場に到着した","translatedEnglishLine":"Shortly after, 6,000 troops of the Zeth homeland army led by Magic arrived at the battlefield."},{"lineNumber":252698,"originalJapaneseLine":"どういう事、ハニーが魔物と仲間割れ・・・","translatedEnglishLine":"What's going on? The Hannies are having infighting with the monsters..."},{"lineNumber":252699,"originalJapaneseLine":"誰かが補足、ウルザさんがハニーの事はなんとかすると言っていました","translatedEnglishLine":"Someone added that Urza said they'd handle the Hannies somehow."},{"lineNumber":252700,"originalJapaneseLine":"この事では・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Could it be about this matter..."},{"lineNumber":252701,"originalJapaneseLine":"そこにハニーが現れた。ゼス軍だね。アクシュ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Then the Hannies appeared. The Zeth army, right? Akushu."},{"lineNumber":252702,"originalJapaneseLine":"ボク達は魔物は許せない、一緒に戦おう。","translatedEnglishLine":"We cannot forgive the monsters. Let's fight together."},{"lineNumber":252703,"originalJapaneseLine":"あっ、ゼスの人達でボク達に魔法が効かないからと毛嫌いしていたみたいだけど","translatedEnglishLine":"Ah, the Zeth folks seemed to detest us because magic doesn't work on us,"},{"lineNumber":252704,"originalJapaneseLine":"意外と可愛い人が多いね、僕すきになっちゃった","translatedEnglishLine":"but there are actually many cute people. I kind of like them now."},{"lineNumber":252705,"originalJapaneseLine":"マジックのまわりをうろうろするハニー、みてみて、この人　委員長だよ、委員長","translatedEnglishLine":"Hannies wandering around Magic—look, this person is the chairman, the chairman."},{"lineNumber":252706,"originalJapaneseLine":"ちょっと何かいってみて委員長","translatedEnglishLine":"Say something, please, Chairman."},{"lineNumber":252707,"originalJapaneseLine":"ふざけないで戦争中なのよ、貴方たちの仲間も今戦っているのでしょ、早く戦場に","translatedEnglishLine":"Don't joke around; we are in the middle of a war. Your comrades are fighting now too, so get to the battlefield quickly."},{"lineNumber":252708,"originalJapaneseLine":"うわっ・・おこった、叱られた、やっぱ委員長だーと喜ぶ","translatedEnglishLine":"Wow... she's mad, scolded us! As expected of the chairman! [They rejoice]"},{"lineNumber":252709,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔軍の陣地","translatedEnglishLine":"Demon army's camp."},{"lineNumber":252710,"originalJapaneseLine":"ツォトンがいる、ハニー達め裏切りやがって","translatedEnglishLine":"Tsoton is here. Those Hannies betrayed us."},{"lineNumber":252711,"originalJapaneseLine":"所詮、陶器の畜生か、扱いやすい連中だから利用してやったのに","translatedEnglishLine":"They're just fragile beasts after all; they were easy to manipulate, so I used them."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 地図で説明するとここです
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: On the map, it's this place.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ここから近いです。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's close from here.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よし、すぐに向かうぞ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alright, let's head there immediately.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: はい、マジックが率いる主力軍も今向かっているはずです。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yes, the main army led by Magic should be heading there now as well.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私はマジック達と合流します、後でまたと千鶴子は戻っていく
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I will join Magic and the others; Chizuruko will go back later.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 背景　戦場を見下ろす丘
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Background: Hill overlooking the battlefield.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 目的の近くに来たが、なんだ騒がしいぞ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We've gotten near the destination, but what's this noise?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 少し丘を登ってみると、数万の魔物と数万ほどのハニーが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Climbing a little up the hill, tens of thousands of monsters and about the same number of Hannies

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大激戦をしていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: were fiercely battling.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんだ・・これは仲間割れか・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What... is this infighting?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺達、人類軍はどこにもないな、マジック達が来るといっていたが遅れているのか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Our human army isn't anywhere to be seen. Magic said they'd come, but are they delayed?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物とハニーの戦いだ、奴ら手を組んだのでは無いのか・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's a fight between monsters and Hannies. Weren't they supposed to be working together?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あいやー、あいやー、こいつら倒せー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Aiyaah, aiyaah, defeat these guys!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どういう事だ、これは・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What is going on here...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: わかりません、ですが、チャンスです。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I don't know, but this is a chance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この混乱に乗じてウルザさんの居る所へ、魔物大将軍を倒しに向かいましょう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Let's take advantage of this confusion and head to where Urza is to defeat the monster general.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 少し前
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A little earlier.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ハニーキングの陣、側には魔物軍から派遣された魔物隊長が居る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At the Hanny King's camp, a monster captain dispatched from the monster army stands nearby.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ウルザの手紙を受け取っていたハニーが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A Hanny who had received a letter from Urza

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ウルザからの信号を受けてハニーキングに手紙を渡す
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Received a signal from Urza and handed the letter to the Hanny King.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その手紙には、メディウサによる悲惨な女の子の殺戮写真が入って居た
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The letter contained gruesome photos of girls slaughtered by Medusa.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍は捕まえた人間をこんな風に処分しますよと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It said the demon army disposes of captured humans in this way.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 怒るハニーキング、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Hanny King, enraged,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 側の魔物隊長に言う、君・・これはどういう事だね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: says to the monster captain beside him, 'You... what is the meaning of this?'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物大将軍ツォトン君は、我々と一緒に人間をいじめて可愛がろうという話だったが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Monster General Tsoton was supposed to be playing nice and bullying humans together with us,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これは、殺戮ではないか、というか女の子にこんな事をしてはいかーーん
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but this is slaughter, and doing such things to girls is unacceptable!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: わかった、お前達は俺達の敵だ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I see. You all are our enemies.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いや、しかし、ハニー達も人間と敵対しているのでは・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No, but aren't the Hannies also hostile toward humans...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ばかやろう、俺達は人間と仲良く喧嘩したいのだー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You idiot! We want to have a friendly fight with humans!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 乱戦の最中、ハニー達の部隊と遭遇
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: During the chaotic battle, we encountered a Hanny unit.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ハニーの隊長は、ランス達を見て部下を止める
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Hanny captain sees Lance and the others and stops his subordinates.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まて、今は人間達と遊んでいる時では無い、ハニーキング様は魔物を
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Wait, now is not the time to play with humans. The Hanny King has ordered to

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 本気で殲滅せよと命じられたのだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: seriously annihilate the monsters."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あいやー、はにほー、はにほー」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Aiyaah, haniho, haniho." [Hannies' chant]

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ハニー達は、ランス達を無視して戦場に海に消えていった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Hannies ignored Lance and the others and disappeared into the battlefield and sea.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よくわからんが、ウルザが言っていたハニー達はなんとかするというのは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I don't really understand, but maybe what Urza said about the Hannies 'taking care of things'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こういう事だったのかもしれないな。と誰か、ランスでもいいし
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: is something like this. Someone — Lance or anyone — said so.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: とにかく魔軍はハニーとの相手で混乱している、いまのうちに敵ボス
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Anyway, the demon army is in chaos dealing with the Hannies, so now is the time to attack the enemy boss.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物大将軍ツォトンを倒すぞ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Let's defeat Monster General Tsoton.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ハニーの部隊と遭遇した時、ランス達とは特に関係なくていいです
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When encountering the Hanny unit, no special relation to Lance and the others is necessary.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ハニー同士の２．３クリックの会話
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A 2-3 click conversation between Hannies.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦場で魔軍と戦っている所だが、遊んでいる感じ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They're fighting the demon army on the battlefield, but it feels like they're playing.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ハニーの部隊と遭遇した時、ランス達とは特に関係なくていいです
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When encountering the Hanny unit, no special relation to Lance and the others is necessary.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ハニー同士の２．３クリックの会話
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A 2-3 click conversation between Hannies.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦場で魔軍と戦っている所だが、遊んでいる感じ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They're fighting the demon army on the battlefield, but it feels like they're playing.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 少し遅れてマジックが率いるゼス本国軍６千が戦場に到着した
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Shortly after, 6,000 troops of the Zeth homeland army led by Magic arrived at the battlefield.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どういう事、ハニーが魔物と仲間割れ・・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What's going on? The Hannies are having infighting with the monsters...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 誰かが補足、ウルザさんがハニーの事はなんとかすると言っていました
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Someone added that Urza said they'd handle the Hannies somehow.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この事では・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Could it be about this matter...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そこにハニーが現れた。ゼス軍だね。アクシュ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then the Hannies appeared. The Zeth army, right? Akushu.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ボク達は魔物は許せない、一緒に戦おう。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We cannot forgive the monsters. Let's fight together.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あっ、ゼスの人達でボク達に魔法が効かないからと毛嫌いしていたみたいだけど
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah, the Zeth folks seemed to detest us because magic doesn't work on us,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 意外と可愛い人が多いね、僕すきになっちゃった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but there are actually many cute people. I kind of like them now.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マジックのまわりをうろうろするハニー、みてみて、この人　委員長だよ、委員長
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hannies wandering around Magic—look, this person is the chairman, the chairman.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ちょっと何かいってみて委員長
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Say something, please, Chairman.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ふざけないで戦争中なのよ、貴方たちの仲間も今戦っているのでしょ、早く戦場に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Don't joke around; we are in the middle of a war. Your comrades are fighting now too, so get to the battlefield quickly.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: うわっ・・おこった、叱られた、やっぱ委員長だーと喜ぶ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Wow... she's mad, scolded us! As expected of the chairman! [They rejoice]

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍の陣地
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Demon army's camp.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ツォトンがいる、ハニー達め裏切りやがって
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Tsoton is here. Those Hannies betrayed us.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 所詮、陶器の畜生か、扱いやすい連中だから利用してやったのに
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They're just fragile beasts after all; they were easy to manipulate, so I used them.
